Name: Sona
AbilityDescription:
Sona cycles between 3 phases, firing 2 beams that:

1: Deals magic damage to the closest enemies.

2. Heals the lowest health allies.

3. Deals magic damage and stuns the closest enemies.

Phase 1 Damage : 140 / 210 / 360

Healing : 180 / 220 / 300

Phase 3 Damage : 100 / 150 / 225
